He played 15 seasons in the NBA between 1984 and 2003, winning six¬†NBA championships¬†with the¬†Chicago Bulls. Widely considered to be one of the greatest players of all time,[9][10][11]¬†he was integral in popularizing basketball and the NBA around the world in the 1980s and 1990s,[12]¬†becoming a global¬†cultural icon.[13]
